page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: During the survey it was obvious that the most popular past-time was watching television, followed by reading. Other hobbies included gardening, walking, home maintenance, handicrafts and sport. The area has a variety of Clubs and Societies to join, which cover most peoples' interests. The average number of families in Glasshouses which attends such clubs etc is 4. The ladies most popular club was the Womens Institute and the village has a very successful Cricket Club. The Sports' Centre in Pateley Bridge is widely used for a variety of sports namely, squash, badminton, volley ball and indoor cricket, football and tennis and the children from the area attend Cubs, Scouts, Brownies and Guides in Pateley Bridge and Dacre Tops.
